apuntador.title: [b]Introduction[/b]
apuntador.txtlibre01: Often the need arises to introduce a large amount of data, a task we may find tedious. Excel provides us with tools that facilitate and expedite this activity so that we can focus our attention on the data and unconcerned of the place that will occupy within the spreadsheet. With the power that Excel can give us, often times, enter data only and the rest will automatically complete the spreadsheet.
